body_html:
@skye Thank you for your reply!

I have already built TF from source and it is all set up, yet I do have the same issue where I use the TF's C++ API in a project that requires manually feeding data (char*) into tensors; to avoid this, I tried @pdrews's approach and I got the compile error that I've mentioned.

Because I still use the C++ API, it seems to me that I should still keep copying the data in order to run my NN -- Correct?
